title: EconomicEvent
description: An event modifies the quantity of resources available to one or more agents

action.description: The hash of an Action object whose behavior defines this event's effects

inputOf.description: The hash of a Transfer object whose inputs property is this event

outputOf.description: The hash of a Transfer object whose outputs property is this event

affects.description: The hash of the EconomicResource affected by this event

receiver.description: The hash of an Agent who is affected by this event

provider.description: The hash of an Agent who enabled this event

scope.description: A Hash of anything that is the context of this event

affectedQuantity.description: The quantity of this.affects that is affected
